long_description: Comfortable whether you're hiking a hot trail or crossing a cool stream, the women's REI Sahara Shorts feature a lightweight performance fabric and plenty of pockets for essentials. Lightweight nylon fabric dries fast and has a durable water repellent finish to shed moisture and stains; shorts pack down small. UPF 50+ rating provides excellent protection against harmful UV rays. Multiple pockets provide storage for essentials; many pockets have secure zip closures and all pockets have mesh or eyelets to allow drainage. Center gusset eases movement; soft waistband liner and flat seams increase comfort. Women's REI Sahara Shorts have a traditional rise and a relaxed fit that allows for comfort and movement.
